question.title: How do I enable custom treatment of onBackpress in Android?
question.body:
I have been going through all of the recommendations and none of them work. This is current code.

    @Override public void onBackPressed(){
        if( isCustomKeyboardVisible() ) {
            hideCustomKeyboard();
            return;
        }

        if (isTaskRoot())
            Utils.exitAlert(this);
        else
            super.onBackPressed();
    }

Android Studio

Doesn't recognize BuildCompat

Doesn't recognize enableOnBackInvokedCallback

Doesn't recognize getOnBackInvokedDispatcher()

I'm thinking I need some kind of import, but AS doesn't suggest one.

I want to avoid using AndroidX. Last time I tried it was too much work elsewhere.

My phone was recently updated to Android 16.

My last app release was Nov 27 and onBackPress worked. It may have been installed when it was still Android 15. The new release does works on my Android 10.

Setting enableOnBackInvokedCallback to false will not build.
